title: (x) CBS Accept The Challenge 2008 square sans caps - Bank Gothic {BJ, Ken Messenger}
content:
Can anyone tell me what face is used for the “Accept the Challenge” line in this? As always, I stand in awe of the expertise and knowledge of the folks who hang out here...

Thanks in advance...

David

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142626im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ChessLogoBW_5175.jpg)

comments.content:
You folks are the BEST!!!

Thanks again!

David
